content.text:
HON. BRUCE WESTERMAN

                              of arkansas

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 1, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. WESTERMAN. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidable detained and had to 
miss the vote on H.R. 2521, South Carolina Peanut Parity Act. Had I 
been present, I would have voted Yea on Roll Call No. 591.
content.speaker: Mr. WESTERMAN
